title: Best of The Herd: 08/27/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/27/2018
description:
Colin wonders why NBA players get to roll with entourages yet Tom Brady has one trainer accompany him and the media continually questions him about it. Hall of Fame Tight End and Undisputed Host Shannon Sharpe comes in studio to discuss Dak Prescott and Sam Darnold. Plus, Colin tells us where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
